subject: Re: [sugar] Sugar translation
body:

I have few questions :>  - Who owns the copyright on the translation files ? Red Hat ? Ivan> Krsti\u0107 ?>   
You should own the copyright.
>  - I never used git. I'm not sure, but the command I'll have to type to> commit the file is : $ git commit sugar/po/sugar.pot , right ?>   
Follow the process here to submit translations:http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Activity_Translations#Translators
